title: Adam Sandler | Fox News Won't Air First Primetime January 6 Committee Hearing Live: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the January 6 committee investigating Donald Trump's coup attempt preparing to hold its first televised hearing in primetime while Republicans are already lying about it.

Then, Adam Sandler talks about how his phone gave him a black eye, getting invited to talk to the film school at NYU with Paul Thomas Anderson and playing the guitar at his bar mitzvah in his parents' basement.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
